body.name: Smart Watch with Bluetooth Call, 1.85" Smart Watches for Men Women, 112 Sports Modes Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Fitness Watch Smartwatch for Android iOS, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 42 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 42 mins
features: Bluetooth Call and Message Reminder: Poounur smart watch is equipped with a state-of-the-art single-chip processor and a responsive microphone so you can make or receive calls without inserting a SIM card. In addition, the smart watches provide social media notifications including Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter and more through vibration alerts to keep you informed without missing any important messages. (Note: You can add up to 100 frequently used contacts to your smartwatch).

1.85" Touch Screen and DIY Watch Faces: The smart watch is equipped with a 1.85-inch TFT-LCD transparent glass screen, which is scratch-resistant and less likely to leave marks due to daily friction, while realizing stronger visual impact and larger content space. The 4-level adjustable brightness ensures optimal viewing even outdoors. With the "Gloryfit" app, you can choose from over 200 dial styles. In addition, you can also select your favorite photo as a wallpaper in the watch.

All-day Health Monitoring: The fitness smart watch is equipped with advanced sensors that detect real-time heart rate throughout the day to help you better understand your body condition. The activity trackers also automatically monitors your sleep patterns during sleep (including deep sleep, light sleep and wakefulness) to fully analyze your sleep quality. Through the app, you can view a weekly health report, providing you with health advice to help you adopt a healthier lifestyle.

112 Sports Modes: Sports smart watch offer 112 indoor and outdoor training modes, including running, walking, cycling, soccer, yoga and more. It can meet the needs of most sports enthusiasts and can accurately record the number of steps, distance, calories, exercise time and other data to help you scientifically develop a training program. IP68 waterproof design allows you to sweat and wash your hands without fear, providing convenience for your daily life.

Long Battery Life and Multi-Functions: The fitness tracker is powered by a 280 mAh battery with a low-power design that provides up to 7 days of use and up to 30 days of standby time, and takes only 1.5 hours to charge. It is widely compatible with Bluetooth 4.0, Android 5.0, iOS 9.0 or later smartphones. In addition, the smartwatch offers a variety of useful features such as alarm, stopwatch, timer, phone search, camera control, sedentary reminder, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Versatile Excellence: A Comprehensive the Feature-Rich 1.85" Smart Watch"
reviews.reviewText: The 1.85" Smart Watch offers a comprehensive experience, blending Bluetooth calling, 112 sport modes, heart rate, and sleep tracking. Its IP68 waterproof design adds durability. Compatible with both Android and iOS, it caters to a wide user base. A stylish choice for fitness enthusiasts seeking a feature-packed smartwatch with versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of adjustability in the band size and bright dispplay
reviews.reviewText: The screen on this smartwatch is crisp and easy to read. The interface is intuitive and user-friendly. It took under 10 minutes to completely set up the watch. The watch offers a plethora of features that cater to both fitness enthusiasts and daily users alike. Many watch faces are available to customize the look you want.The charging is really fast and seems to last a very long time. This watch is so much better than some of the really popular watches out there with the features and ease of use. I'm definitely happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: P66 Smart Watch, my first purchase for this type of product…Pros: soft, comfortable, and durable silicone wrist bands with metal buckles (and you get two); high polished rectangular glass screen about 1 5/8 inches height and 1 3/8 inches width with great color and resolution; one multi-purpose button for on/off and return to home screen; 7 screens include widgets, home/main, steps/mileage, heartrate, oxygen level, sleep monitor, weather…all seem to be non-customizable except for the widgets screen which allows for different “themes” in the Settings Menu to change the screen arrangement, all seven screens are very well laid out. Cons: my weather screen had the wrong location and corresponding weather details and I could not find how to select/change to the correct location in the GloryFit app; my phone Bluetooth connection showed repeated intermittent “active” status, not sure why, although this didn’t seem to affect performance that I’m aware of; user manual, USA customer service number/email, or web site online help needs to provide better/more details for setup and operation. Note: This watch benefits greatly with the GloryFit app on your phone, if not loaded then you cannot set the correct date/time, input personal data, and many features do not work. Oxygen sensor readings are higher than my fingertip pulse oximeter, but I believe that technology is above that in smart watches. Final: I think this is a high-quality and high-value product so far and will explore it’s many additional features, i.e. phone calls, text messaging, media.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Accurate and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Struggled with some smart watches in the past (incorrect heart rate etc) but this one seems to be very close and accurate. It's also a great gift to give!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great economical smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: Economical, stylish, lightweight smartwatch. Big watchface. Easy setup to my iPhone and be sure to install the watch app (QR code on operating instructions). In the app there’s a bunch more selection for watch faces and on the watch itself there’s a few selection of themes. An affordable simple to use smartwatch. Definite recommend if you’re looking for something that doesn’t have too much bells and whistles but desire something solid and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The watch was very easy to set up and to use. It is comfortable and very pretty and functions perfectly with my android phone. I give it a 5 rating must say it does charge very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fitness tracker, long battery life, sync with Google fit
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My last smart watch died and I chose this one to replace it. As with my last one, this watch has a great battery life, it will easily run for a week or more without the need for a recharge. The watch does not only count the steps, but it also tracks heart rate, sleep and blood oxygen. The size is great and the watch is comfortable to wear. I am especially happy that this watch integrates with Google fit, because (unlike my last watch) it will preserve my training records also when I get a new watch in the future. I have not had any problem with this watch, nothing negative to report, therefore I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks cool and works well
reviews.reviewText: Good buy at affordable price. Comes with additional wrist belt at no extra cost which is great. You can receive calls. You can get text messages, but have not tried responding to them with it yet. The display quality is so good and touch experience is smooth. It is very handy. Variety of watch faces available to choose from app.

Sono assolutamente entusiasta delle prestazioni di questo smartwatch! Ha superato di gran lunga tutte le mie aspettative. La sincronizzazione con il mio smartphone è stata eseguita senza intoppi e l'interfaccia è eccezionalmente intuitiva. La varietà di funzioni che offre è veramente notevole, dalla completa tracciatura delle attività fisiche all'integrazione impeccabile delle notifiche.Devo sottolineare l'impressionante durata della batteria di questo smartwatch. Mi ha piacevolmente sorpreso la precisione del monitoraggio del battito cardiaco e del conteggio dei passi.Il design incarna un'estetica moderna e accattivante, mentre il comfort del braccialetto rimane insuperabile. La solidità e la durabilità sono chiaramente evidenti nella costruzione dell'orologio, infondendo fiducia nella sua resistenza anche durante le attività fisiche più vigorose.Senza dubbio, sono estremamente contento del mio acquisto e raccomanderei questo smartwatch con tutto il cuore a chiunque cerchi un orologio multifunzionale di alta qualità. Indubbiamente merita un eloquente punteggio a 5 stelle dal mio punto di vista!

Pour le prix, je ne m'attendais pas à grand-chose, mais cette montre a vraiment dépassé mes attentes.La montre est très réactive, ce qui facilite la navigation à travers les différents menus.Les fonctionnalités de suivi d'activité sont également excellentes. La montre compte avec précision mes pas, surveille ma fréquence cardiaque et même mon sommeil. possibilité de recevoir des notifications directement sur ma montre, ce qui me permet de rester connecté sans avoir à sortir mon téléphone à chaque fois.En ce qui concerne l'autonomie, je suis agréablement surpris. Je peux facilement tenir deux jours complets sans avoir à la recharger, ce qui est idéal pour mes déplacements.En résumé, cette montre connectée à bas prix offre un excellent rapport qualité-prix. Si vous recherchez une option abordable mais performante, je vous recommande vivement de donner une chance à cette montre. Elle vous surprendra, tout comme elle m'a surpris !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great smart watchSo I bought this for my son, opened to check all was ok and it blew me away. I was not expecting so much for so little.The watch is a lovely stone grey and comes with 1 smooth and 2 textured strap, straps are so easy to remove. And the features are amazing if your into sports and fitness it's got all you will need more than yo need. The software is easy to install and use. The watch can even handle calls and messaging from many apps. It's waterproof to quite a depth and can customise the faces it's a really good watch smart yes, good-looking yeh, and packed full of features, for sure A+ so my wife bought one 😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great Smart watch for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: This watch was purchased to keep me active on a budget. It does pretty much everything most people want for a fraction of the price. I am able to keep track on my steps, distance and overall calories for daily targets and the APP is very easy to use. As most other smart watches, it also allows me to control music, displays messages and notifications and even lets you answer calls from the device.For the price and features, this gets a 5 star!Anyone looking for a first time smartwatch should consider this for sure. All the features of other brands for a fraction of the cost. It also looks great, and comes in different colours.Very Pleased!

reviews.reviewTitle: oounur Montre Connectée Homme Fomme avec Appels Bluetooth
reviews.reviewText: Je suis très satisfait de cette montre connectée. Elle est à la fois belle et pratique. Le design est élégant et sobre, et les matériaux sont de qualité. Les fonctionnalités sont nombreuses et complètes, et elles répondent à tous mes besoins. Je n'ai pas encore eu l'occasion de tester toutes les fonctionnalités, mais je suis confiant qu'elles sont toutes aussi performantes. bon rapport qualité/prix
